org.hypergraphdb.atom

Class HGSubgraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hypergraphdb.atom.HGSubgraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HGGraphHolder, HGHandleHolder, HyperNode

    public class HGSubgraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements HyperNode, HGHandleHolder, HGGraphHolder

    A HyperNode that encapsulates a set of atoms from the global HyperGraph database. A subgraph can be thought of as a hyper-edge in the standard set-theoretic formulation of hypergraphs.

      • getIncidenceSet

        public IncidenceSet getIncidenceSet(HGHandle handle)
        Return incidence set where each element is a member of this HGSubgraph. The atom itself whose incidence set is returned doesn't have to be a member of the subgraph!
        Specified by:

      • removeGlobally

        public boolean removeGlobally(HGHandle handle)
        Removes the atom globally from the database as well as from the nested graph.
        Parameters:
        handle - The atom to remove.
        Returns:
        The result of HyperGraph.remove.

      • removeGlobally

        public boolean removeGlobally(HGHandle handle,
                     boolean keepIncidentLinks)
        Removes the atom globally from the database as well as from the nested graph.
        Parameters:
        handle - The atom to remove.
        keepIncidentLinks - - whether to also remove links pointing to the removed atom. This parameter applies recursively to the links removed.
        Returns:
        The result of HyperGraph.remove.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(HGHandle handle)
        Removes an atom from this scope. The atom is not deleted from the global HyperGraph database. If you wish to delete it globally, use HyperGraph.remove.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface HyperNode
        Returns:
        Return value is unreliable
